verbs.description: < p > [ARG1: Many South Koreans] [V: were] fuming [ARGM-TMP: on Friday] after U.S. President Donald Trump canceled a historic summit with North Korea 's Kim Jong Un , feeling they had been cheated of a chance of a lifetime to live in peace.</p >
